title: Buffer
description: A buffer points to binary geometry, animation, or skins.

uri.description: The URI (or IRI) of the buffer.
uri.gltf_detailedDescription: The URI (or IRI) of the buffer.  Relative paths are relative to the current glTF asset.  Instead of referencing an external file, this field **MAY** contain a `data:`-URI.

byteLength.description: The length of the buffer in bytes.
